archimate:Resource.name: Virtualized Infrastructure
archimate:Resource.documentation: This ABB supports the utilization of infrastructure in a virtualized manner by the operational and hosting runtime environment. Thus, the use of shared disk space in a cloud environment would be an example.

properties.value: This ABB supports the utilization of infrastructure in a virtualized manner by the operational and hosting runtime environment. Thus, the use of shared disk space in a cloud environment would be an example.
